p: The concentration of drugs that caused 80% cellular cytotoxicity is referred to as CC 80. Experiments were performed in triplicate. Data are represented as the mean Â± standard deviation (SD). Statistical differences were determined using a paired t-test and a one-way ANOVA using the Prism 8.0 software (GraphPad Software,). A p-value <0.05 was selected to indicate significance.
